text: Troy Bryan Downing (born March 4, 1967) is an American politician and businessman. He is a member of the U.S. House of Representatives for since 2025. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was the Montana state auditor from 2021 to 2025. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Montana Category:Politicians from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Troy Downing
